description: A massive underground arena located within Breed's ship, featuring stadium-style seating, viewing platforms, and a glass floor over water. Breed uses this arena to force his collared captives to fight for his entertainment.

keyEvents.title: Breed Reveals His Arena
keyEvents.description: Luffy, Law, and Chopper are brought to Breed's underground arena where they see the scale of his entertainment operation.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the main setting for the confrontation between the alliance and Breed.

keyEvents.title: Luffy vs Law Forced Battle
keyEvents.description: Breed forces Luffy and Law to fight each other to the death in the center of the arena.
keyEvents.significance: The arena becomes the battleground testing the pirate alliance.

keyEvents.title: Glass Floor Shattered
keyEvents.description: The Kung-Fu Dugong's Haki-enhanced punch sends Luffy and Law crashing through the glass floor into the water below.
keyEvents.significance: Creates a life-threatening situation for the Devil Fruit users.

statusHistory.reason: Arena is operational and used for forced combat entertainment

description: A large pirate ship commanded by Breed that contains a massive underground arena and entertainment facility. The ship has an underwater entrance and serves as Breed's mobile base of operations.

keyEvents.title: Interior Arena Revealed
keyEvents.description: The interior of Breed's ship is shown to contain a massive arena facility.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the scale of Breed's operation within his ship.

statusHistory.reason: Ship is fully operational during the Caesar Retrieval Arc
